SEARCH
Package game.llm

Class GeminiService

java.lang.Object
game.llm.GeminiService
All Implemented Interfaces:
LLMService
public class GeminiService extends Object implements LLMService
An implementation of the LLMService interface that connects to Google's Gemini API to generate text responses based on input prompts.

This class builds and sends HTTP requests to the Gemini 1.5 Flash model and parses the response to return generated content.

Note: This implementation requires a valid Gemini API key.

Author:
Mohanad Al-Mansoob
